data.name: CRAVE
data.detailed_description:
Untie the Fabrics of a Forgotten Realm


Built between engulfing arms of whispering seas and upon overambitious dreams, the isle realm of Foghorn now lies in ruin. Devoid of it's crown, land is clogged in filth, vanity and petrifying fear.

Crave is a classically styled 2D action adventure through a vast interconnected world. Explore gnarled alleys and corners of a decaying realm by utilizing your carnivores arsenal.



Game Features


  • Classic 2D side scrolling action adventure.
  • Tightly refined controls for challenging combat and platforming action.
  • Explore mossy bathhouses, cabaret theatre or a moldy greenhouse within a vast interconnected world.
  • Rediscover and utilize your carnivore abilities assisting you in both combat and exploration.
  • Devour your adversaries, whether they're men or beasts. Utilize their abilities in combat.



  • Chart the layout of the kingdom using your acute sense of smell and urination of claimed territories.
  • Equip various trinkets and talismans for a further customization of your playstyle.
  • Hand drawn 2D traditional animation style.
  • Original and evocative soundtrack, composed by Sky To Speak.



Supported using public funding by Slovak Arts Council

data.short_description: Ceaseless hunger draws you yet a bit closer to the gates of Foghorn. Devour men and beasts alike to acquire a wide array of combat abilities. Through shadows and mold, track down the paling memories of this bygone kingdom, all in a classic hand-drawn action platformer.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7 (SP1+) and Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo E5200
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce 9800GTX+ (1GB)
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 9 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: 1080p, 16:9 recommended
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 (64bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i5
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 560
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 9 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: 1080p, 16:9 recommended
